alert.note: Alert for Banner; Box Butte; Dawes; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 22 at 2:30AM CST until November 25 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MST THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH 11 PM MST FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 30-40 mph across areas of higher terrain along the Pine Ridge, and southeast Wyoming. * WHERE...Portions of panhandle Nebraska and south central and southeast Wyoming. * WHEN...From 2 PM MST Thursday afternoon through 11 PM MST Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact holiday travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Very cold temperatures are expected to be present on Friday and Friday night. Impacts to local agriculture, including the ranching community are possible as wind chills near or below zero will be present.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Banner; Box Butte; Dawes; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
